name: Piano Ball: Run On Music Tiles
name_original: Piano Ball: Run On Music Tiles
description:
Exciting Piano Ball dance. Join the challenge!
Do not hit the white and trap tiles. Along with the piano music, let your ball jump out of a beautiful dance.
This game is easy to play and extremely addictive.

Game features:
- Simple and smooth control.
- Beautiful 3D music scene, everyone can become a pianist.
- Breath rhythm will challenge your handspeed limit.
- Speed Challenge brings you thrill and adventure.
- Share your high scores with your friends and compete against players. around the world on the leaderboard.
- High quality piano music soundtracks.

Begin the endless jumping fun now!
